resources.string: "If the client does not know mother's name or doesn’t have a primary female caregiver default to JANEDOE and enter OE as the UIC code."
"For clients born outside of Malawi default to OUT as the District of Birth and enter UT in the UIC field."

"If the client knows only their age/year of birth but doesn’t know the day and month, then the default day is 15 and default month is June. If client knows year & month, but not the specific day, then DOB is 15 of the month and given year as indicated by the client."
"If the client was born as part of a multiple child pregnancy tick this box."
"Select the birth order of the client from this multiple child pregnancy, not the birth order of all the siblings in the entire family."
